short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🚀 An AI-powered Chrome extension that helps developers quickly create error documents! 📄✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Introducing Throttle AI - The Ultimate Tool for Developers & Software Professionals!

🛠️ Are you tired of spending hours documenting errors and issues? Throttle AI is here to make your life easier by helping you spin up error documents effortlessly! Here's why you should install it:

📑 Quick Error Documentation: Instantly generate comprehensive error documents with ease. Highlight your key points, and let our AI do the rest!
🖼️ Add Up to 4 Images: Provide additional context by uploading images to your error documents. Perfect for screenshots or visual debugging!
🧠 AI-Powered Insights: Our smart AI analyzes your highlights and creates well-structured documents tailored to your preferences. Save time and focus on coding!
🖥️ Seamless Integration: Works hand-in-hand with our Throttle AI website to store, edit, and manage your documents. Your data, organized and accessible!


🌟 Coming Soon!

📥 Download Your Documents: Export your error documentation in a click.
✨ Custom Document Styles: Choose from various professional templates to make your documents shine!
👥 Throttle AI for Corporate: Enterprise features for team collaboration and error management.
🌐 Throttle AI Hub: Explore and learn from documents published by other developers. Knowledge sharing made easy!

🔥 Save time, reduce stress, and streamline your documentation process! Install Throttle AI and revolutionize how you handle errors.
